mapper.select: select a.product_code productCode,a.product_status pStatus,a.create_time createTime, b.merchant_name merchantName,c.module_name moduleName from merchant_goods_product a left join merchant b on a.merchant_id = a.id left join merchant_goods_module c on a.module_id = c.id where a.id = #{id}

SELECT mgp.product_code AS productCode, t.price AS productPrice, mgp.product_status AS productStatus, pgb.brand_name AS brandName, t1.params AS productParams FROM merchant_goods_product mgp LEFT JOIN merchant_goods_module mgm on mgm.merchant_id = mgp.merchant_id and mgm.id = mgp.module_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT mgpp.product_id, min(mgpp.price) AS price FROM merchant_goods_product_price mgpp GROUP BY mgpp.product_id ) t ON mgp.id = t.product_id LEFT JOIN platform_goods_brand pgb ON pgb.id = mgp.brand_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT mgpp.product_id, group_concat(mgpp.params_name) params FROM merchant_goods_product_params mgpp GROUP BY mgpp.product_id ) t1 ON t1.product_id = mgp.id where mgp.product_status != 0 and mgm.module_code = #{moduleCode}
AND ( mgp.product_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchInput}, '%') OR pgb.brand_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchInput}, '%') )
